pages.text: Cavalier King Charles Spaniels were originally bred to be lap dogs, or occasionally hunt small birds.$(br2)At only around half a black tall, these regal dogs come in four different coats.
Example of a Cavalier King Charles Spaniel
Cavalier King Charles Spaniels can be found most commonly in various snowy biomes. They may also be found in taigas and ice spikes, and more rarely in meadows.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Chicken Treat.
